<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2120</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2120</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">¡Qué noticias!</string>
            <string language="en">What news!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Welche Nachrichten!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quelles nouvelles !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que notícia!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che notizie!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποιες ειδήσεις!</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica interactiva (MUD) adreçada al cicle superior de primària sobre les notícies periodístiques i les seves parts. Conté activitats de pràctica (Practica), que fan relacionar text/imatge/estructura, i d'avaluació (Avalua't), que aprofundeixen en l'estructura interna de la notícia.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) for 10- to 12-year-olds on newspaper stories and the parts they are made up of. It includes practice activities to relate text/image/structure, and self-assessment exercises on the internal structure of the news item.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">mètode actiu</string>
            <string language="en">activity method</string>
            <string language="es">método activo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">exercici pràctic</string>
            <string language="en">practical exercise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació primària</string>
            <string language="en">primary education</string>
            <string language="es">educación primaria</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit (SCHLAMM) für 
10 zu 12-year-olds auf Zeitung Geschichten und die Teile werden sie 
von gebildet. Sie schließt Praxisaktivitäten ein, um 
text/image/structure in Verbindung zu stehen, und Selbstbewertung 
trainiert auf der internen Struktur der Nachricht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) pour 10 à 
12-year-olds sur des histoires de journal et les pièces elles se 
composent de. Il inclut des activités de pratique pour associer
text/image/structure, et art de l'auto-portrait-assessment s'exerce sur la structure
interne de la nouvelle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) para 10- a 
12-year-olds em histórias de jornal e as peças são compostos de. 
Inclui atividades da prática para relacionar 
text/image/structure, e o self-assessment exercita na estrutura 
interna do artigo de notícia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) per 10 a 
12-year-olds sugli articoli giornalistici e le parti si compongono di.
Include le attività di pratica per collegare 
text/image/structure e la valutazione di se stesso si esercita sulla 
struttura interna della notizia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) για 10 στο 
12-έτος στις ιστορίες εφημερίδων και τα μέρη αποτελούνται από. 
Περιλαμβάνει τις δραστηριότητες πρακτικής για να αφορά 
text/image/structure, και τις ασκήσεις αυτοαξιολόγησης στην 
εσωτερική δομή του αντικειμένου ειδήσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aktivität Methode</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">praktische Übung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Primärausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">méthode d'activité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">exercice pratique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation primaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">método da atividade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">exercício prático</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução preliminar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">metodo di attività</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esercitazione pratica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione primaria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μέθοδος δραστηριότητας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πρακτική άσκηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πρωτοβάθμια εκπαίδευση</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
